entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
